summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the licensing and regulation of drivers of Seattle-licensed commercial passenger vehicles; adding to the New License Code (Ordinance 108934) a new Chapter 4; and repealing Sections 103, 104, 105, and 107 through 114 of the License code (Ordinance 48022); and repealing Ordinances 53281, 60694, 66558, 72318, 73763, 74223, 75087, 78349, 79402, 79606, 80689, 80738, 83281, 88789, 89770, 95008, 97841, 100014, 100478, 102636, 104649, 106063, 106189, and 107157, which are amendatory thereof.
